caption: Best bar in the area. No frills and half the bill of some places nearby. Service is swift, helpful, and down to earth. Food is great, they don’t cut corners. Go for the Greek burger.
Love this place.
We love this place. Bartenders are always friendly and they have a good selection of beer on tap. Such a great neighborhood spot in Mt. Pleasant!

*COVID review*  Marx has plenty of outdoor seating in their streatery (?) and the tables and chairs are well spaced. This place is always great for its no frills selection of beers and wines. I haven't had the food but the menu seems Greek / Italian-ish which will be delicious one day.
Great atmosphere and combination of Greek and Italian dishes.

username: My Sacred Living Temple Shah Khan

caption: We had a great dinner and wonderful drinks. The bartender was amazing and the owner came to check on how our visit was going. I will definitely be back. Monday movie night was amazing!
Chill place for drinks and food. So glad it's stayed open during the Covid. Happy to support it.

SERVICE NOT AS ADVERTISED.  Following the code Marxist principle of "From each according to his ability, to each according to his needs," I went in and asked for free food. They denied me service.  Clearly not a Marxist cafe.
Cozy bar with delicious Greek and Peruvian cuisine with amazing kind, welcoming, always smiling, and helpful owner and staff.
Closest thing to a quaint neighborhood bar in DC. Super friendly service, great food and ambience.
Love this spot in my neighborhood.  Place to grab a bite or a drink with no fuss. I highly recommend.
The food is average or a bit bettee.  However it has one of the best Happy Hours in the cities with drinks specials and 1/2 price appetizers that can create a meal.
Great food and awesome service

Very cute, nice place. Poor vegan options and out of the two beers I wanted. I hope they get them back. More vegan options are also necessary, especially considering animals are the most oppressed class and any revolution must be egalitarian and ecological.
Real DC. If you want to find where bartenders and barflies come when they're close to home, here it is. Dark enough to make anyone feel attractive
Nice bar. Kinda small but cozy. Staff was really nice. They had a dj on the night i went and i had a great time. Drinks are really good. Will definitely go back.
The best!!!!

(Translated by Google) It has a very pleasant atmosphere, a variety of dishes such as entrees and main courses, it has a very convenient happy hour from 4 to 7 pm every day. The service is very good, although sometimes the site gets too crowded and there are only one or two waiters, then orders may take time to arrive at your table.  (Original) Tiene un ambiente muy agradable, gran variedad de platos como entradas y principales, tiene un muy conveniente happy hour de 4 a 7 pm todos los días. El servicio es muy bueno, aunque algunas veces se llena demasiado el sitio y solo hay uno o dos meseros, entonces los pedidos pueden tardar en llegar a tu mesa.

Marx has excellent food, a great beer selection and the people who work there are incredibly kind. It is my favorite place to eat and drink in Mount Pleasant. As a bonus they feature unique musical performances and DJ nights.
Cosy, warm, live music, some belgian beers in a nice neighbourhood!
Cool place. Great atmosphere.
Too dark. But calamari was good.
Server was friendly. My Marx Manhattan was stiff. I would definitely go again, although next time I'll probably get the codfish & chips instead of the burger.
(Translated by Google) It's very good  (Original) Esta muy bien
Macaroni was pretty good considering to they mostly offered cheese on the menu.
A place with a lot of potential that has been devoid of identity despite the name on the sign.
Good food and drinks!
Will is the best bartender EVER!!!
Enjoyed a perfect after work dinner with small plates and a bottle of wine. Will recommend and return again!
Lively Jam session with host, Frank O. Agbro
Couldn't find anything to do with Karl Marx and communist revolution.
Excellent food. Great atmosphere. You should totally go.
Amazing place
Affordable and fun, they regularly have live music. Easily the best bar in Mount Pleasant.

Great little hole in the wall! Been by it a ton of times but stopped in for brunch on New Year's eve and had great food and a phenomenal bartender. Looking forward to coming back to watch a soccer game!
Nice place, small, must be early to get a table, Kike and Miguel's group was great!!! Good service, mix drinks not so much, stick to wine and beers
Great local bar
Manny is awesome

Marx Cafe was a great place. We visited as a group of about 14 and they prepared special dining and sitting arrangements to accommodate our number. We had very great food and the customer service too was great. Relatively short wait times for the number of orders we placed. They also allowed us to bring our own wine, which they chilled and served us. It was a great experience. The only downside was the spacing...the restaurant could easily be filled up since it's not too big. I will recommend for a smaller group.
Love the bartender on Thursday night and the featured musical guest. The service is attentive the beats are on point and this location usually attracts a fun and trendy crowd.
Pleasant neighborhood place with a friendly staff.  The cafe hosts a scrabble night for a local group every other week.
Good night cap
We enjoyed visiting Marx several times during our 3 day stay, the food was excellent,  the staff very friendly and attentive, and the local patrons a delight to talk too.
Great neighborhood bar, awesome live music especially bluegrass on Thursday nights!  Food is ok, service is spotty.  Glad your in Mt. P!

I’ve been going to Marx for the last 5 years and it is one of my top neighborhood spots. The space is cozy, the staff is friendly and attentive, the food is delicious, and the owner supports local music / has shows on a regular basis. What more can you ask for!?
Great local hangout, great music!
The Greeks don't bite.
this place has a strange fat guy named Chris who smells really bad. also there is a blind guy who always orders Maker's Mark who smells like bug repellent. stay away from this clown house
Good food in a cosy space with a small, but well thought out, beer list.

Marx, one of the few remaining og neighborhood bars in Mt Pleasant is a fun spot to hangout. The owner, Haris, is an old skool proprietor doing everything he can to make each patron feel extra special  And the food! Man, I've never had a bad experience eating there and I can pretty much guarantee that you won't either. It's an interesting mix of Greek and Italian comfort food - Yums!  The atmosphere is super chill and super friendly. In the past there used to be a really irie series of DJ Nights ranging from Reggae to Indy to African. Those nights were so much fun!  Check out Marx if you are in the mood for some good eats and/or a couple frostys and just  chillin at the ultimate neighbourhood bar
Nice food nice drinks

Everyone here is very friendly, excellent service and the fish and chips are great! Most of their entrees are great but keep in mind they do best with pub food. Most nights I’ve been here they had great live music too. Note: I’m usually here for Sunday dinners or a random Tuesday / Wednesday night Low key wanna go out / eat out. I’ve sat in bar and dining area and both experiences were great. It can be quiet but not awkward and they have local art on the walls.
Great neighborhood bar all locals Balkan night Saturday
Nice crowd and bartenders
Great food, strong drinks, good music, intimate but spacious interior. What more could you ask for?
Regular stuff done well.
Good neighborhood venue.
Is so good.
It was a wonderful experience, nice music.
Good food, Monday's half price bottles of wine deal is great.

Great food and ambiance. They have a large drink menu. I ordered the burger and my friend ordered the trout. The only reason I am not giving this place 4 stars is because my friend’s trout had so many bones and he couldn’t eat it. BUT the waiter was so nice that he exchanged it for a burger at no charge. The double chocolate ale was delicious. I will definitely come back to check out their live music nights. Give it a try.
Very friendly bartender, good beer selection, relaxed atmosphere
Great bartender, good beer and atmosphere. We only had a couple of drinks because we had a dinner reservation down the street, but we will definitely come here again.
Pretty good food, drinks, and service. Definitely recommend if you're in the neighborhood. Friendly, casual atmosphere.
Don't go for brunch. Overpriced lamb souvlaki and nothing special.
The service was excellent and gave great advice on wine and food.
Come on a music night!
Great draft beer selection
The staff did not prepare my food in a timely manner, two visits in a row.  Cozy,  friendly, vibe and ok food, if you are willing to wait until your stomach has already eaten itself to be served.
We had the grilled octopus and vegetarian wrap, both were good. Service was ok, a little slow.
Rockfish and mashed potatoes, yum.
Good music and not too loud. Could easily carry a conversation.
A great, laid back, friendly, neighborhood bar.
Laid back bar
Great for appetizers and beer!

First Fridays 80's night was a blast. Calm and cozy interior converts to dancehall after 10:30pm. Drinks aren't cheap but they did have cider, which was a gluten-free plus. Cool vibe, worth a return visit.

Went to Marx Cafe after dinner and was met with tremendous amounts of disrespect and snobbery from the bartender named Will. He stated himself that none of the cocktails are any good and he was lacking materials to make them. The drink we asked for was a simple rum with mint(Che and the Cuban). I don't think it was racism, but I am not sure what it was. The bartender seemed like he chose to single us out and treated us far worse than his other patrons. On a positive note, the bar quickly apologized through email when i explained this incident.  Fuimos a Marx café después de la cena. Pedimos una bebida simple (Che y cubano = rum y menta). El camarero de bar nos habló con dignación y nos dijo también que ninguno de los cócteles son buenos. No sé si fue el racismo, pero seguramente nos trató terriblemente. Si usted es latino sugeriría elegir otros negocios que rodean alrededor como Haydees.
Loud place, mediocre looking food at comparatively high prices. There are better options nearby
Friendly, fast and the lamb was amazing!
It's great! Must try their Tres Leches!

Excellent happy hour. Charming atmosphere. Very good food. The dolmas are the best in the area. Fun crowd. Interesting wine list. Good value. It is not, lol, "expensive." Especially by DC prices. Gracious owner.
Great local place. Try the empanadillas.
Great customer service!  Loved the Shrimp pasta.
Lovely atmosphere, very good prices for DC, and delicious food. Also very nice wait staff.
They make me feel like in home, nice place to talk and share with friends

My fvaorite restaurant in Mt Pleasant. The food is pricey, but super good. The ambiance is more dark, but it's Marx Cafe after all. Great small plates and they have hard cider (though, unfortunately, just Woodchuck in a bottle).

I love this place. The food is alright. I've tried a lot off of the menu and think people would enjoy eating here. Nothing fantastic but good enough. What I do like is that they host reggae soundclash which is a classic Reggae event. It is held the last Friday of every month and it is always packed. If you like classic reggae and decent food try this place.
Ordered grilled shrimp. No part of shell removed and so too much time spent removing shell. Wine selection was good. Nice atmosphere.
Brunch with a big mug of coffee. No attitude servers, just friendly. 'Nuff said.
